Texts.Eng: From deep below me, I can hear...no, feel...^red;something dark and terrible^reset; lurking in the abyssal darkness. Dare I investigate the ^red;source of that slurping, wet cacaphony^reset;?

Texts.Chs: 就是这样，结束了。我曾经对这个世界恐惧万分。但是现在我已经不再畏惧，感觉一切都是如此的美好。
Texts.Eng: That's it. I'm done. That place was terrifying beyond my capacity to tolerate. But I killed that abomination, and feel pretty darned amazing now.
